scripts.recognize-image: ts-node -e "import { recognizeImage } from './image-recognition'; const sepIndex = process.argv.indexOf('--'); const args = sepIndex >= 0 ? process.argv.slice(sepIndex + 1) : process.argv.slice(2); const image = args[0]; if (!image) { console.error('Usage: npm run recognize-image -- <imageFileName>'); process.exit(1); } recognizeImage(image).then((res) => { console.log(JSON.stringify(res, null, 2)); }).catch((err) => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); });" --
